George went to a store and bought some t-shirts. He went to another store and bought 2 more t-shirts. He bought a total of 15 t-shirts. How many t-shirts did he buy at the first store?

lido-cell.onEntry: this.z-index='1'; this.grid-template-columns='repeat(auto-fill, minmax(140px, auto))'; this.gridTemplateRows='repeat(auto-fit, 145px)'; this.flexWrap='wrap'; this.justify-content='center';

lido-text.string: I am a colour. I am mentioned in the poem along with Yellow and Blue. My name starts with the letter 'R'. Who am I?
Select the correct answer from the options provided.

lido-cell.onEntry: this.place-items='center';this.gap='1px'; this.padding='0px'; this.gridTemplateColumns='repeat(auto-fill, minmax(143px, auto))'; this.gridTemplateRows='repeat(auto-fit, 362px)'; this.flexWrap='wrap';

lido-container.onCorrect: question-board-image.transition='transform 1s ease'; question-board-image.transform='rotateY(180deg)'; question-board-text.transition='opacity 0.5s ease'; question-board-text.opacity='0'; option-row.opacity='0'; invisible-text.transition='opacity 0.5s ease'; invisible-text.opacity='1'; invisible-text.visibility='visible'; background-animation-plus-minus-1.opacity='1'; background-animation-plus-minus-2.opacity='1'; background-animation-multiplication.opacity='1'; this.sleep='4000';

lido-text.string: Solve the problem shown in the board and select the correct answer
The library has 5 more tables than the school office. The school office has 2 tables. How many tables does the library have?
solve the problem and select the correct answer from below
lido-text.value: solve the problem and select the correct answer from below

lido-container.onCorrect: lido-avatar.avatarAnimate='Success'; this.sleep='2000'; answer.visible='false'; lido-avatar.animation='placeToLeft 2.5s linear'; answer.animation='placeToLeft 2.5s linear'; truck.animation='placeToLeft 2.5s linear'; trainAudio.speak='true';
